          <title>
            <string language="hu">A hidraulikus emelő munkavégzése</string>
            <string language="en">Working of the hydraulical raiser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion des hydraulischen Erbauers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctionnement de l'éleveur hydraulique</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργασία υδραυλικό raiser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Funcionamiento del cultivador hidráulico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Nem takarítunk meg munkát a hidraulikus gép használatával</string>
            <string language="en">We don't save labour using the hydraulic machine</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">hidraulikus emelő,  </string>
            <string language="en">hidraulic raiser,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wir sichern nicht Arbeit mit der hydraulischen 
Maschine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous ne sauvegardons pas le travail à l'aide de 
la machine hydraulique</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós não conservamos o trabalho usando a 
máquina hidráulica</string>
          </description>

macchina idraulica</string>
          </description>

μηχανή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">No salvamos el trabajo usando la máquina 
hidráulica</string>
